text: Tadera ki pa ache ya diye tara calate pare, athaba tadera ki hata ache ya diye dharate pare, athaba tadera ki cokha ache ya diye dekhate pare, athaba tadera ki kana ache ya diye tara sunate pare? Balo -- ''dako tomadera ansidaradera, tarapara amara birud'dhe phandi atom, ara amake abakasa di'o na
